rakheyadeshabadEnglish.English: Rakhya De Shabad
sir mastak rakhayeaa <font color='Orange'>paarabrahaman</font> hast kaayaa rakhayeaa paramesavaireh ||
aatam rakhayeaa gopaal <font color='Orange'>suaamee</font> dhan charan rakhayeaa jagadheesavaireh ||
sarab rakhayeaa gur <font color='Orange'>dhayaaleh</font> bhai dhookh binaasaneh ||
bhagat vachhal anaath <font color='Orange'>naathe</font> saran <font color='Green'>naanak</font> purakh achuteh ||52||
ghor <font color='Green'>dhukhayen</font> anik <font color='Orange'>hatayen</font> janam <font color='Green'>dhaaridhran</font> mahaa bikhayeaadhan ||
miTant <font color='Green'>sagal</font> simarant har <font color='Green'>naam</font> <font color='Orange'>naanak</font> jaise <font color='Green'>paavak</font> kaasaT bhasaman karot ||18||
<font color='Green'>soraTh</font> mahalaa panjavaa ||
gur kaa <font color='Orange'>sabadh</font> rakhavaare ||
<font color='Orange'>chaukee</font> chaugiradh hamaare ||
raam <font color='Orange'>naam</font> man laagaa ||
jam lajai <font color='Orange'>kar</font> bhaagaa ||1||
prabh <font color='Orange'>jee</font> too mero sukhadhaataa ||
bandhan kaaT kare man <font color='Orange'>niramal</font> pooran purakh bidhaataa
|| rahaau ||
<font color='Orange'>naanak</font> prabh abinaasee ||
taa kee <font color='Orange'>sev</font> na birathee jaasee ||
anadh <font color='Orange'>kareh</font> tere dhaasaa ||
<font color='Orange'>jap</font> pooran hoiee aasaa ||2||4||68||
<font color='Green'>bilaaval</font> mahalaa panjavaa ||
taatee vaau na <font color='Orange'>lagiee</font> paarabraham saranaiee ||
chaugiradh hamaarai raam <font color='Orange'>kaar</font> dhukh lagai na bhaiee ||1||
satigur pooraa <font color='Orange'>bheTiaa</font> jin banat banaiee ||
raam naam aaukhadh <font color='Orange'>dheeaa</font> ekaa liv laiee ||1||
rahaau ||
raakh leee tin <font color='Orange'>rakhanahaar</font> sabh biaadh miTaiee ||

jeh saadhoo gobidh <font color='Orange'>bhajan</font> keeratan naanak neet ||
